description.text: With a touch, you cause a glowing rune to appear on a single weapon, granting that weapon the flamingproperty (and allowing it to cause an extra 1d6 points of fire damage on a successful hit). If you are using the judgment class feature, your weapon gains the flaming burstproperty instead. The spell functions only for weapons that you wield. If the weapon leaves your hand for any reason, the spell effect ends. The effects of this spell do not stack with any existing flamingor flaming burstweapon property that the target weapon may already possess.
